effect.name: CRTVert
effect.description: Simulates a CRT display for a retro look.
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Phase
parameter.description: Adjusts the vertical position of scanlines.

parameter.name: Input Gamma
parameter.description: Assume NTSC 2.2 Gamma for linear blending.

parameter.name: Distortion
parameter.description: Controls the intensity of the barrel distortion used to emulate the curvature of a CRT. 0.0 is perfectly flat, 1.0 is annoyingly distorted, higher values are increasingly ridiculous.

parameter.name: Input Width
parameter.description: The width of the input signal relative to the texture size.

parameter.name: Input Height
parameter.description: The height of the input signal relative to the texture size.

parameter.name: Output Width
parameter.description: The width of the output signal relative to the texture size.

parameter.name: Output Height
parameter.description: The height of the output signal relative to the texture size.
